ygData.subject: Re: Area effect songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Of what we ve noticed so far, it does clear the hate list for everyone but you. You can have a wizard burn the mob almost entirely to the ground and lull it
ygData.messageBody:
Of what we've noticed so far, it does clear the hate list for everyone but
you. You can have a wizard burn the mob almost entirely to the ground and
lull it once for it to attack you. I've noticed though that once a mob is
lulled, your hatedness by the creature is very low. If you don't do anything
else to it the next hit by someone else will draw it off.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
8)Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 9:55 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Area effect songs
8)
8)
8)From: John Kim <kim@...>
8)
8)On Wed, 2 Jun 1999, Rogers Pessin wrote:
8)>
8)> A question about the lullaby spell. Is its area of effect centered
8)> on you as the caster, or can you target something some distance from
8)> you and it is centered on your target?
8)
8)Centered on you. Goatnatos' guide says it also clears the
8)hate list. Has anyone found this to be the case? They always
8)seem to attack me when they wake up, no matter how far I run
8)away. I tried testing it on mobs other people were attacking
8)but the results were inconclusive.
8)
8)--
8)John H. Kim
8)kim@...
8)
